headline: Can AI Legally Turn $100,000 Into $1 Million? Microsoft AI CEO Mustafa Suleyman Says That's The Real Test Of Intelligence
summary: On Monday, Microsoft Corp (NASDAQ:MSFT) AI CEO Mustafa Suleyman says the next milestone toward artificial general intelligence won't be about sounding human, but about whether an AI agent can independently and legally create real economic value. A New Take On The Turing Test Taking to X, Suleyman reframed the decades-old Turing Test for the modern AI era, writing, "The next big milestone I’m watching for on our way to AGI: Artificial Capable Intelligence (ACI). headline: A Look At Cognizant Technology Solutions (CTSH) Valuation After Closing The 3Cloud Acquisition
summary: Cognizant Technology Solutions (CTSH) has closed its acquisition of 3Cloud, adding more than 1,000 Microsoft Azure specialists and expanding its data and AI services across banking, healthcare, technology, and consumer focused clients. See our latest analysis for Cognizant Technology Solutions. The share price has climbed in recent months, with a 22.59% 90 day share price return and a 12.43% 1 year total shareholder return, suggesting momentum has been building as investors weigh the 3Cloud...
